documentation.content: If `workload.googleapis.com/zookeeper.file_descriptor.open` is about to hit `workload.googleapis.com/zookeeper.file_descriptor.limit` zookeeper will not be able to handle any new requests and will fail to connect new clients.

conditionMonitoringQueryLanguage.query:
fetch gce_instance
| { metric 'workload.googleapis.com/zookeeper.file_descriptor.limit'
; metric 'workload.googleapis.com/zookeeper.file_descriptor.open' }
| outer_join 0
| group_by 1m
| sub
| condition val() < 1000
